EmailTemplate.description: appraisal form is submitted to the Appraiser Sent email to Appraiser
EmailTemplate.name: Submit to Appraiser
EmailTemplate.subject: Submitted the Appraiser form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Signed By Appraiser
Dear {!AppraiserName} ,
{!AppraiseeName} has Submitted their Appraisal form to you. Kindly go through it and provide the feedback and comments for their Appraisal within the corresponding end date {!EndDate}.
Thank & Regards,
KRIYA(PMS)
